page.title: 06 ******ENTERTAINMENT*****
page.content: { Willington Power Station Social Club Admission to the social club is open to 'members' only. There are snooker tables,pool tables, dart-boards,dominoes and an outdoor sports field for football,cricket etc. There is also a small golf course too. The club is open each lunch-time and in the evening as well.The club is closed on Christmas Day. The club is a place where people go to meet friends, have a drink and a chat, or something to eat. {Willington Players { }The Willington Players is a stage society. They have staged twenty-one productions over he last fifteen years.Most years two production are staged; a revue and a pantomime.All productions are none profit making with any money raised being used to pay for the next production.
